ProductInfo.Features:
•	Camera Features: Indoor/ Outdoor Security Camera  •	1/4" Color CMOS  •	420 TV Lines, Horizontal  •	3.6/6.0mm  See in the Dark up to 50ft with Automatic Night Vision •	IR LED: 30 pcs  •	IR Irradiation Distance: 15m  Weather Resistant Housing •	Mount: Ceiling or Wall  Easily Connect to TVs and DVRs •	Video Connector: BNC  •	Power Connector: RCA 12V DC  •	Signal System: PAL/NTSC
Easy USB Backup •	A Built-in USB port gives you the option of backing up and transferring your video footage with a USB flash drive.  Continuous Recording; 24/7 Scheduled Recording; Motion Detected Recording •	You have the option to record constantly, record based on a set schedule or record only when motion is detected.  Search by Date, Time or Event Included Mouse and Remote Control
Package Includes:  •	(1) D7178HT Surveillance DVR System with NO HD  •	(4) C7614YD Indoor/Outdoor CMOS  Security Camera  •	(4) X1811BD 60ft Video + Power All-in-one CCTV Cable  •	(1) IR Remote Control & Mouse  •	(1) Power Adapter  •	(1) Ground wire  •	(1) 1 to 5 Splitter Cable  •	(1) User's Manual
